revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (2), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (2)

|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SK hynix;HY27UF084G2B-TPCB; |flash1size = 512 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5PS5182FFP-S5C; |ram1_num = 8 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1118; |eth3chip = Marvell;88E1118; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 4C:E6:76
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SATA II |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 4 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->

|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery, metal case, Dual fan, heatsink |addchip = RS-232 Transciever;Sipex;SP3243;;1;,,, RS-232 Driver Receiver;Sipex;SP3220;;1;,,, I2C Real Time Clock;Ricoh;RS5C372A;;1;,,, 4Bit SPI Serial Flash;STMicro;M25P40;;1;,,, PCI Express Clock;Pericom;PI6C557-03;;1;,,, Hex Schmitt-Trigger Inverter;TI;SN74LVC14A;;1;,,, 30V 7A Switching Transistor;Rohm Semi;SP8K3;;1;,,, 4-Port PCIe SATA II Controller;Marvell;88SX7042;;1;,,, 8-bit Single-Chip Microcontroller;NEC; D78F0513;;1;,,, Dual Positive-Edge-Triggered D-Type;TI;SN74LVC74A;;1;,,, Dual USB High-Side Power Switch;Diodes Inc;AP1212;;2;,,, Field Programmable DSP Switcher;Marvell;88PG847B;;2;,,, Quadruple 2-Input Positive-AND Gate;TI;SN74LVC08A;;3;,,, 3A Peak Current Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;MVPG31;;5;,,, Quadruple 2-Input Positive-NAND Gate;TI;SN74LVC00A;;2;,,, 28V 3A Step-Down Switching Regulator;Semtech;SC4525A;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 03/2009 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Marvell]]'' MV78100 @800MHz Dual Issue (ARM v5) *Memory: 512MB (SDRAM) DDR2 *Storage: 512MB NAND Flash, 4x SATA II *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 3x USB 2.0 *Power: 120-240V via C13
==Links of Interest== :[https://opensource.buffalo.jp/ts-xl-161.html Latest GPL Source]
